author: JillfromNJ
title: Just booked our third stay for June 2017!! Stayed in June 2016 & November 2016
text: We stayed in June 2016. We enjoyed it so much we went back again in Nov & just booked a trip for June 2017. Aneka and Tamrah who work during breakfast and the happy hour social make it feel like home!
